thread.title: Wacky racers: The most ridiculous cars on the road
thread.title_full: Wacky racers: The most ridiculous cars on the road - Telegraph

author: Ali Gray
title: Wacky racers: The most ridiculous cars on the road
text: Every now and then you speed past a car on the motorway that makes you do a double take. No, we’re not talking about Maseratis and Ferraris – although those do merit a lingering glance. We’re talking about the bizarre, wacky, absurd vehicles that pose the question: why would anyone do that to their car? These rides are a far cry from the understated black motors that most drivers choose – but we bet you’d crack a smile if you pulled up next to one at a stoplight. We’d love to see Paul and Ringo battle it out over who gets to ride in the yellow submarine. Photo: Rex Allow us to introduce the amphibian of cars… Photo: Getty His mum told him to get his lazy bum off the sofa and go outside. He got one part right. Photo: Rex And you thought all those Beanie Babies had turned out to be worthless… Photo: Rex The little (not so) old man who lived in his shoe. Photo: Rex A new sort of flower-delivery service. Photo: Rex Who says a car park can’t be a nice place to soak up the sun? Photo: Rex For serious football fans only. Photo: Rex Driving anywhere other than to the pub would be shameful. Photo: Alamy Think you’re skilled at billiards? Try shooting on a moving table. Photo: Rex Upside? Uri earned his 15 minutes of fame. Downside? His family must now eat every meal with their hands. Photo: Rex Proof that living in your car isn’t always so bad. Photo: Rex Spend more time laughing and less time worrying behind the wheel. With the AA on your side, you're covered when the unpredictable happens. Find out more at theaa.com
